mapper.sql:
ID, REPORT_DATE, SHOULD_REPORT_DATE, NEXT_SHOULD_REPORT_DATE, REPORT_RESULT_ID, DIC_TYPE_KEY, DIC_ONSCHEDULE_KEY, DIC_SMS_ENABLED_KEY, DIC_ENABLED_KEY, NOTE, VOICE_PATH, CULPRIT_ID, CREATED_TIME, DIC_REPORT_STATUS_KEY, BGNR, JLR, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, (select c.name from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=CULPRIT_ID) culpritName, (select c.DIC_MONITOR_GRADE_KEY from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=CULPRIT_ID) dicMonitorGradeKey,
DEL_FLAG
mapper.insert: insert into SF_DAILY_REPORT_LAST (ID, REPORT_DATE, SHOULD_REPORT_DATE, NEXT_SHOULD_REPORT_DATE, REPORT_RESULT_ID, DIC_TYPE_KEY, DIC_ONSCHEDULE_KEY, DIC_SMS_ENABLED_KEY, DIC_ENABLED_KEY, NOTE, VOICE_PATH, CULPRIT_ID, CREATED_TIME, DIC_REPORT_STATUS_KEY, BGNR, JLR, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shouldReportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nextShouldReportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reportResultId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicOnscheduleKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicSmsEnabledKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicEnabledKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voicePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dicReportStatusKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update SF_DAILY_REPORT_LAST
REPORT_DATE = #{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SHOULD_REPORT_DATE = #{shouldReportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NEXT_SHOULD_REPORT_DATE = #{nextShouldReportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REPORT_RESULT_ID = #{reportResultId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_TYPE_KEY = #{dicTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_ONSCHEDULE_KEY = #{dicOnscheduleKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_SMS_ENABLED_KEY = #{dicSmsEnabledKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_ENABLED_KEY = #{dicEnabledKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VOICE_PATH = #{voicePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DIC_REPORT_STATUS_KEY = #{dicReportStatusKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BGNR = #{bgnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JLR = #{jlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SF_DAILY_REPORT_LAST set REPORT_DATE = #{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SHOULD_REPORT_DATE = #{shouldReportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NEXT_SHOULD_REPORT_DATE = #{nextShouldReportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REPORT_RESULT_ID = #{reportResultId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_TYPE_KEY = #{dicTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_ONSCHEDULE_KEY = #{dicOnscheduleKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_SMS_ENABLED_KEY = #{dicSmsEnabledKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_ENABLED_KEY = #{dicEnabledKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VOICE_PATH = #{voicePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DIC_REPORT_STATUS_KEY = #{dicReportStatusKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BGNR = #{bgnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JLR = #{jlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: AND exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g left join SF_CULPRIT c on g.id=c.group_id where c.id=CULPRIT_ID)
AND exists (select * from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=t.CULPRIT_ID and c.name like '%'||#{culpritName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')
AND exists (select * from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=CULPRIT_ID and c.DIC_MONITOR_GRADE_KEY= #{dicMonitorGradeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select count(*) from SF_DAILY_REPORT_LAST t where t.next_should_report_date>sysdate and t.next_should_report_date<sysdate+7
